articles.author: Joshua Franklin, Stephen Gandel
articles.title: Short seller warned US regulator about Signature Bank in January - Financial Times
articles.description: Property-focused lender had a reputation for promoting entrepreneurial bankers and a blind spot for risk
articles.content:
Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation officials were told in mid-January that Signature Bank, a New York City-based lender with about $90bn in deposits, was in trouble. 
A letter from a short seller… [+6013 chars]

articles.author: Philip Pilkington
articles.title: Are we about to enter a full-scale banking crisis? - UnHerd
articles.description: When is a banking crisis a banking crisis? These past few days we have seen the failure of multiple banks. The action started with Silicon Valley Bank and soon spread to Signature Bank, making those two the second and largest bank failures in American history…
articles.content:
The international monetary system is looking increasingly shaky 
The KBW Bank Stock Index (BKX) paints a worrying picture
